title: 76: Probate Court Plays A Big Part in The Murdaugh Fraud Charges. We Talked To A Judge
description:
Probate court has played a big role in the way Alex Murdaugh and his cohorts, allegedly, stole millions of dollars from their clients. We wanted to find out all about the South Carolina Probate courts. We talked with SC Judge Jesse S. Cartrette about what type cases probate courts handle. Plus, we asked the judge if the type of stealing we have seen in the Murdaugh related cases unusual.
To find out more about Judge Cartrette www.votecartrette.com
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
